Reviews.Title: REALLY NICE
Reviews.Author: suni
Reviews.Content: I received this phone in record time from Amazon!!!  Thank you.I've seen this phone for alot more money,  Great price.I've had the smartphones.....tired of the crazy phone bill, with this that and the next thing adding up!!This is a great phone and I won't have the crazy phone bill.  Easy to set up and AT&T; did the rest.You can get messenging and e-mail, but not for me.  All I do is make phone calls and use the bluetooth when I'm in the car.

Reviews.Title: Good, basic phone
Reviews.Author: John from OC "Mustanggamer"
Reviews.Content: I originally bought a Samsung Galaxy 2 for my wife with all the bells and whistles and $25 data plan. For the last 6 months of owning the Galaxy, my wife used a total of zero data. She just wants a phone to call people, not use it to look up Facebook. So, we bought this phone and got rid of the data plan. It's only been a few weeks, but the phone has been working great and the call quality is superb. It was easy to set up as the only thing we did was take out the sim card from the Galaxy and put it into the A777. That was it and the phone recognized the sim card right away.

Reviews.Title: GREAT basic phone - STURDY
Reviews.Author: AnniebanannieSJC
Reviews.Content: This is a great "basic" phone - Other basic flip phones always broke at the hinge after about a year and were made of cheap plastic. This phone is made of substantial materials and the slide design is very sturdy, plus helps protect the keyboard. I also like how the slide feature elongates the phone, so the mouthpiece is down by my mouth - don't feel like I need to remove the phone from my ear in order to talk into the microphone.  And even though it's "basic" by today's standards, it has a GPS feature that serves as a 411 or map directions. Nice big screen, easy to view, has the basic camera... Sound is great and speaker feature very loud and clear. Great product, especially for the price. I took it for a swim with me, so I'm having to replace it and thankful I found it on Amazon, because the stores claim these basic phones aren't available anymore. I got the BLACK Samsung A777...the red amsung A777 is labeled as "unlocked phone" and was concerned this meant it was used.

Reviews.Title: great basic phone
Reviews.Author: Paul Mazzariello
Reviews.Content: I've had this model phone for 3.5 yrs,finally the screen went,all squiggly lines so i cant access any features,cant text,cant see contacts.Recently dropped the insurance but I like this phone so much i just bought a replacement here on Amazon.If u want a good basic phone,i'd def.recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung A777 Phone
Reviews.Author: onecent6
Reviews.Content: I replaced a prior A777 phone that had Kool-Aid spilled on it.  I really like this phone so I purchased another.  The only problem I seem to have with this one is that the battery doesn't seem to stay charged very long.

Reviews.Title: Samsung A777
Reviews.Author: GNL
Reviews.Content: Phone delivered fast in new box.  Comes with the MicroSD charger.  Nice durable phone with large lite keys making for easy text or calls.  Ringtone limited to 300kb.  Maximum memory is 8Gb and does not come with memory card.  Over good experience.  This was a gift and was giftee was very happy with the phone.The bad reviews seemed to from people that have to have the latest gizmo.  Spoiled?

Reviews.Title: World Phone
Reviews.Author: Jilly
Reviews.Content: Love the fact that I can swap sim cards and have a phone that works in Europe. Didn't even have to unlock it

Reviews.Title: Bad Deal
Reviews.Author: CARDELL DANIELS
Reviews.Content: The phone lacks the ability to hold a charge. After charging all night, I have to charge it at noon time and  as soon as I arrive at home in the evening. I have had three  of the very same models and my partner uses the same model. This is the first time I have had a problem with maintaining battery power and my partner does not have the power issue with the same model. I have returned the phone and the replacement had the same battery issue. It costs to much to keep returning the phone when all I wanted was a basic phone which I could use for  phone calls. I will just write this one off and look for a replacement. DO NOT BUY THIS WORTHLESS CELL PHONE FOR ANY REASON!

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: Ronald andrino
Reviews.Content: This is for my husband and he doesn't like the smart phones.  This is perfect for what he needs it for.

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: janice perry
Reviews.Content: Great phone my Mom loves it fast shipping !!! This is her 3rd phone same make and model she loves it and is a big texter !!@

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: tonib
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone because it was just like my old one, that i got wet, I love it because it is very practical and user friendly.  I don't want a smart phone, just a good phone!!  texting is easy on it, and the camera is great too.  The screen is a little small for a 50 something person, but I can live with that.

Reviews.Title: used phone
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Phone was supposed to be new, but was badly scratched, even though it was packed in bubble wrap.  Not sure if it might have been a floor sample?But without a way to verify, don't think I'd order this way -- or from this vendor -- again.

Reviews.Title: waste of hard earned money
Reviews.Author: Bergen
Reviews.Content: Product looked good but wouldn't work properly at all.  Service was mostly not there.  Not the area or the service.  It's the phone.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY FROM HERE
Reviews.Author: RACHID QAOUS
Reviews.Content: ITS REALLY BAD I bought Samsung A 777 and gave it to my mom, the screen was not working really when turn on the phone the screen turn blue and cant see anythingreally not new

Reviews.Title: Great service and great buy!
Reviews.Author: Marina "Marina"
Reviews.Content: It was perfect! just what i had been looking for and works great! really looks new and all cables were in great condition.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: ber wedan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone but ever had it and couldn't trance  the where about of this phone. So I can tell

Reviews.Title: This was a tremendous buy
Reviews.Author: SALFARI
Reviews.Content: The phone works great. I love the way this phone is so much simpler to use than many of the more recent ones that have come out but is also full featured.By this I mean the camera takes good shots and has a lot of other options you can use, and also the music player is very good. Plus the phone also accepts micro-SD cards for extra storage capacity.Right price, good features, I'm strong on this phone.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: londongirl
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd phone with this model so I obviously like it, especially for people like me who do not need phones that require extra plans.  It is user friendly and compact.  I would recommend this product for people who want a simple reliable phone.

Reviews.Title: ATT Elements Too Much: Tech Not So Hot
Reviews.Author: DKCDKE
Reviews.Content: The phone works.  But it is dominated by AT&T; stuff.  I don't use AT&T; because it's not available locally.  I thought the phone would be marked with AT&T; and have a few AT&T; things perhaps.  But all the major functions are limited to AT&T...; All of them.  Even the email works only for AT&T.;  I have to handle my email carefully.  The phone should not be sold to anyone not using AT&T.;  And the technology is weak.  The recharge plug is awkward to use, and confused with another, similar input.  And the phone frequently goes to a white screen until you remove the battery for a few seconds.  Again, awkward.  Would not recommend for anyone not using AT&T;, and caution those who do use that carrier.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase & Prompt Service
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I had this phone before unfortunately it became water damaged. As I had my other phone for 1 1/2 years and really liked the simplicity of it I decided to order another one. It shipped must faster than I expected and I am very pleased with my new phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung A777
Reviews.Author: country123
Reviews.Content: I love this Phone and I use my own Ringtones and texting is great and I would recommend this Phone to anyone who wants a simple Phone to work,I love mine.

Reviews.Title: AT&T; a777 cell phone
Reviews.Author: Gomer "me"
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone seems like it is made really good, I do not have AT&T; as my sever I have devote30 for $30 a month unlimited and taxing ,and this phone works grate ,it is a perfect size phone not to big or to small, I like that fact that I can go to another server and use it as long as they take AT&T; phones ,,I can here nice and clear,,I just like this red color ,its charges real fast and the battery lasted all day and that evening I was on the phone for over five hours calling everyone and giving out my new number before the battery went dead it did beep to let me know the battery was low, I have no regrets getting this phone thinking of getting another one just so I have it for the future,, in case I brake or lose this one,,I really like the different headset plug in its different then most it's long and flat plug  but seems that it will not ware out  like the other ones do,,you do need to order the right head sets for AT&T; samsung a777,witch Amazon has at a cheep price, witch I did and it works grate or you can buy the adapter,witch I also did so I could use my more expensive head sets on it as well,I also bought the case for this phone and it is well wroth it,. it will protect this phone and glad I got it ,it was only $1.49 on Amazon all leather and fits perfect this is to nice of a phone not to want to keep it protected, from damage,,if you want a nice basic cell phone and music player then this is the phone,,

Reviews.Title: phone did not charge
Reviews.Author: Angela Prendes
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I had to return this phone. There was a problem with the battery, and it did not charge.  I had to charge it every few hours.

Reviews.Title: Artículo sucio
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: El teléfono estaba muy sucio y los protectores plasticos más, no tenía buena apariencia y el cargador estaba rayado como si ya se hubiera usado, no quedé satisfecho con el producto.Samsung A777 Unlocked Phone with 3G Support, 1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth and GPS - US Warranty - Red

ProductInfo.Features:
2.3-inch TFT LCD display
Affordable 3G-enabled slider phone in red with 1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder and digital audio player
Compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS, Video Share, AT&T; Mobile Music, and streaming video from Cellular Video service
Bluetooth for handsfree devices and stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 8 GB; access to personal email and instant messaging
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A777 Unlocked Phone with 3G Support, 1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth and GPS - US Warranty - Red
